24142572.review:
Guns, Gore & Cannoli is a 2D platformer action game in a beautiful comic style, that plays in the 1920's. You are Vinnie, a mobster and you have been hired to free a man from an opposing mafia gang. As you arrive in a city that resembles New York, you are welcomed by hordes of zombies. That's where your story begins.

Pros:
 - simple but good story
 - nice, bloody splash effects
 - eight different guns that feel very unique
 - well balanced on normal difficulty. Bosses are a little hard but manageable.
 - beautiful, smooth graphics, no glitches
 - nice, discreet selection of songs from the 20's
 - very good voice acting
 - great comic style
 - limited amount of ammunition. I liked it because it forces players to use all weapons.

Neutral:
 - the game is short. I finished it in less than seven hours but if you play it in a rush or on easy difficulty you can probably finish it in five hours. Some people might say that's too short but given the fact that it's not an AAA title I think it's OK.

Cons:
 - most of the remaining achievements after finishing the game on normal difficulty are extremely difficult to collect. 
 - switching weapons via the controller is a little cumbersome, at least in the middle of a fight. That's because you have to cycle through eight weapons.
 - cutscenes are a little blurry
 - achievement for finishing the game on easy difficulty does not unlock after finishing the game on normal difficulty

24135966.review: Simply amazing. Not too hard, not too easy.

24128667.review:
[i]Cosa bella mortal passa, ma non d`arte[/i]

Игра получает:  приз за историчность, приз за лучшую анимацию, приз за просвещение населения.

[b]Очередная игра про зомби?[/b]

Времена сухого закона. Военные корабли теперь работают как трансатлантические челноки, увозя в Новый Свет, разбогатевшем на войне, тех, кто от неё пострадал.
Среди беженцев и вы – сицилийский мафиози, бежавший от чисток Муссолини. Вы готовы браться за самую грязную работу. Как говорят в Италии «Желудок урчит, зато ботинки блестят».
На этих же судах вернулись  домой экспедиционные войска, люди изменённые войной навсегда, они уже носят в себе семя второй мировой бойни.  Солдаты видят, что те, кто остался в тылу, сумели  оградить себя от последствий войны. Буржуазия ожирела на военных заказах, рабочие на фоне ВОСР получили свои уступки. Фронтовикам же пришлось порвать с прежней жизнью, продать многое и сейчас они чувствуют себя обманутыми. В их глазах местное население превратилось в живых мертвецов, деградировавших от праздной жизни и палёной выпивки. Теперь их гнев направлен против мещан и мигрантов (т.е.вас в том числе).
Но трюмы кораблей были забронированы для ещё одних чрезвычайно важных пассажиров – для настоящих победителей Мировой войны – крыс. Разъевшиеся и окрепшие в траншеях они возвращаются как новые хозяева Америки (среди них родители Сплинтера, кстати)
Итак, вам предстоит много стрелять из разнообразного «эха войны» и футуристичного оружия типа пушки Тесла ( на самом деле просто цепной электрошокер)

[b]Потому что все против вас![/b] Вы попадаете в город, который перешёл от войны империалистической к войне гражданской. Солдаты в противогазах перерыли город на зависть Собянину и пытаются воевать с крысами, мафией и зомбимещанами с помощью иприта и зарина. Ирландские мигранты  продолжают борьбу за алкоголизацию, они свихнулись от известий о поражении германского империализма. В канализации крысы-мутанты  ведут свою игру, они любят понюхать отравы и закусить солдатнёй.
Вам придётся разобраться с тем, кто и что является причиной выплеска бешенства, хоть это и не входило  в ваши планы. Но после прохождения игры меня не покидает чувство, что я играл не за того парня, и мы помешали справедливости восторжествовать. 

[b]Анимация:[/b] видишь снимки экрана и понимаешь – что это любовно сделанная игра.
А в меню вас встречает сказочный кириллический шрифт, добавляющий ещё немного сумасшествия. 
Всё отрисованно эксцентрично и эмоционально. Крысы – лучше чем в  Вахе – носатее, безумнее, милее, свирепее.
Солдаты в противогазах дают жару корпусу Криг и Долгу. Даже зомби эмоциональнее чем в Симс.
Возможность выбрать гангстерский прикид, куча и одно оружие – потому что самый шик – уделать всех из «бесконечного пестика» - так перестрелки реалистичнее и дольше.
Режим сражения  чем-то напоминающий Вормс в реальном времени

[b]Игра научит[/b]

Выбирать только тяжёлый уровень сложности и выше
Главное  в жизни вовремя перезаряжаться.

23875401.review:
Crazy Monkey Studios knocks it out of the park with its freshman effort, Guns, Gore & Cannoli. GG&C is a sidescrolling action game in the vein of the Shank games, but much better executed in my eyes. GG&C wonderfully mixes accessibility with fun and excited gameplay that looks great to boot.


Like Shank, the first thing most people will notice with GG&C is the fantastic art direction. I really liked the ripped-from-a-comic-book aesthetic that the game presents and it fits perfectly with its 20’s era gangster vibe. The animations pair quite nicely with the art and are satisfyingly fluid and responsive. The visual layout that Crazy Monkey went with here was very smart, as the action is never muddled and it’s always clear what is background and what is foreground, which not every game does well. These characteristics carry over to the enemies as well as there is good enemy variety and each one has a distinct silhouette and is instantly recognizable. The enemy animation is quite nice as well, as I found shooting the chef and watching him pop like a bloated blood balloon particularly satisfying.


The gameplay itself is quite tight with just the right amount of float (which I’m usually not a fan of, but it works well here). You are progressively given more guns to use and each feels like an incremental upgrade over the prior one without making the previous guns obsolete. One of my biggest complaints with Shank was that when you were hit or knocked down, your character was locked into an animation of them getting up which, if you were swarmed, would lead to an infinite loop causing you to be unable to escape and eventually dying. Klei usually makes very good design choices but that was certainly not one of them. Thankfully, Crazy Monkey does not make this cardinal sin. When you are hit you slow down a bit, but it is easy enough to recover and gives you a chance to escape.


The story is also better than it has any right to be, honestly. While not the deepest of plots, I was engaged enough to care about character’s motivations and it’s clear the team over at Crazy Monkey loves themselves some gangster movies. It’s a simple narrative, but charming all the same.


While I played through the four hour campaign solo, (and loved it) GG&C can be played with up to four players coop, and I imagine it’s even more of a blast there. For me, the game was just the right difficulty when played solo but I’m not sure how enemy scaling works when played with more people. In addition, there is also a versus mode where players can face off against each other. Again, I did not try this mode.


I had my eye on Guns, Gore & Cannoli for quite some time and I’m glad that when I came around to picking it up, it surpassed my expectations. This is definitely in the upper echelon of sidescrollers that I have played and would love to see Crazy Monkey Studios do another. Whether playing it solo or couch coop there is plenty of fun to be had here and it’s definitely a game that deserves your time and attention.

23210054.review:
Guns, Gore & Cannoli puts you in the stylish shoes of mobster Vinnie Cannoli. Residing in Thugtown during the 1920's, Vinnie soon finds himself in the middle of not only a zombie apocalypse, but a war between two mafia families. The game is a 2D side-scrolling shooter that is promised to be packed with action. The real question here, is whether or not this title is worth your time and money.

The hand-drawn graphics have a great comic style to them, and they're very pleasing to look at. There are vibrant colors abound, which off-set the overall noir style and tone of the game. Completing the 1920's gangster era vibe, the jazzy music is a classy touch that completes the overall immersion of the setting. However, there are relatively few enemies that you will encounter; although Vinnie does make a quip about this from time to time, noting that it feels like he's killing the same people over and over again. Oddly enough, the lack of foes does not hinder the game much, as the backgrounds and foregrounds are consistently changing to something new and fresh. That, and the amount of fire, bullets, and explosions pretty well cover up the bad guys anyway.

When it comes to gamplay, Guns, Gore & Cannoli is pretty straightforward. There are copious amounts of weapons that you will acquire throughout the game; a shotgun, mini-gun, flamethrower, rocket launcher, and a magnum are just a very small amount of the large arsenal that you will come across. Likewise, not only do you have grenades at your disposal, but the ever-so-handy Molotov as well. All ammunition, with the exception of your starting handgun, is limited and you must be conservative of your bullets. Like your bullets, your health can also deplete rather quickly in a large swarm of zombies, and you can only heal by gobbling up delicious cannoli that is scattered throughout the levels; usually after a well placed checkpoint.

The game only clocks in at roughly 2 hours in the longevity department, and this is if you take your time to explore and kill as many enemies during your first run through as possible. This time frame is pretty well to be expected for most run-and-gun types, just be forewarned that this is not a title that will keep you entertained beyond one or two playthroughs at the most. The good thing is, is that there are multiple difficulties to try, and a very handy level selection menu in case you want to try out that new laser weapon at an earlier point in the game.

All in all, Guns, Gore & Cannoli is a fairly decent side-scrolling shooter. It takes a unique twist on the over-saturated zombie market of today, by throwing in some Italian gangsters, humor, and a nice plot twist at the end. For the two hours of play time, I wouldn't recommend grabbing this title at its full price, but on sale it's a definite steal. I didn't get the chance to check out the 4 player local co-op, but if you have some friends over they could make this game even more fun.

22705220.review:
*Disclaimer: I purchased this game in April 2016 (Patch 1.2.6) -on sale- for 5 bucks and change. I have played it for over 20 hours, on every difficulty (see my achievements for more). I have not played multiplayer as my Friends do not play, but would love to.

*Overall: I like this game so much I believe it is worth the purchase price, and certainly any sale price. I would hope to see a sequel! Perhaps the [Int 20; Wis 3] Professer returns for revenge...

The gameplay is great although completed within 4 hours, thankfully containing very minimal bugs. (The only annoying one is rare, and involves the player or AI getting "stuck" in mid-jump when adjacent to objects.)
The gameplay is exciting, raw (have you heard the zombies screaming pitifully when you incinerate them?!), action-packed but not wild, and expectedly there are only the simplest puzzles to solve.
The artstyle and graphics are really vivid and detailed. I personally enjoy this style a lot. For example, when the zombie sprinters die, they have this look of almost pain and sadness, and I briefly feel bad for killing a once-father-of-four, if but only briefly.
The design is creative yet refined, and thoughtful. The levels are challenging; the weapons are sufficient in type and quantity as well as being "DOTA Hero-like" (each having distinct strengths and weaknesses); the enemies are likewise fun, varied enough, and well-placed; the bosses are great but FAR too difficult on the Impossible setting - so I suppose the setting name fits.
I could go on but if my review hasn't interested the reader thus far...
Thanks for a great game Claeys Brothers Arts!

22341299.review:
总评：7.5/10

+上世纪30年代美国黑帮背景的2D横版动作射击游戏，让人很自然的联想到著名的电影《教父》
+多种特点鲜明的枪械，针对不同的敌人和地形使用不同的枪械，很有讲究。
+各种爆炸物让玩家大呼过瘾，如：手雷、油桶、汽车等。
+敌人种类丰富，如：僵尸、变异生物、军队、黑帮等。
+多样的杀敌方式，射死它，摔死它，烧死它，炸死它，甚至可以让敌人互殴，自己渔翁得利。
+关卡数量在同类游戏中很良心，共十二关。
+关卡场景很丰富，游戏流程绝不会让玩家生厌。如：游船、码头、街道、仓库、大桥、下水道、实验室等。
+通关后的奖励花样不少，甚至还有宇航服。

-只能水平射击，不能垂直射击和斜向射击，令自由度大打折扣。
-切换武器很麻烦，上弹僵直时间太长，令爽快感大打折扣。
-BOSS太少，只有三次BOSS战。
-全程数码绘和骨骼动画，导致人物动作单调死板，犹如剪纸人一般。

总结：这是一款不错的2D横版动作射击游戏，如果你喜欢《魂斗罗》和《洛克人》，那么这款游戏你也会感兴趣的。

22340954.review:
Es un juego de tiros con las acciones directas y teóricas, con poca o moderada libertad y precisión. La libertad será una línea recta hacia un objetivo y la precisión está casi anulada por el escenario y el control del personaje.
El escenario o escenarios serán laterales, realizado por un motor/editor de dibujo con sprites/dibujos que actuan de elementos, superponiéndose entre ellos para conseguir la jugablidad proyectada. El juego ha quedado de lujo.
Un scroll controlado por el jugador será el encargado de crear una regla básica en la jugabilidad con la que trabajaremos durante todo el juego. El scroll tiene un movimiento brusco sin embargo cuenta con mucha sensibilidad o resolución, y es el que rige el desarrollo de la progresión del juego. Si conseguimos controlar el scroll conseguiremos controlar medio juego porque ''pausaremos'' a nuestro grado la aparición de los enemigos. Esto nos impulsará a completar el juego en: dificultad imposible.

El scroll mencionado arriba será contrarrestado por una dureza en el cambio y manejo de las armas y la gestión de la munición: me ha recordado a los FPS antíguos donde habia un arma para cada número y la munición estaba bien distribuida, y no todos los juegos similares traen estos recuerdos.
He apreciado un retardo importante en el tiempo de respuesta de nuestro personaje, sin embargo especulo que el juego en su totalidad está minisecuenciado en las animaciones: un conjunto de animaciones entres sprites seguidas deben esperar a que otro conjunto relacionado termine.
Tiene un control ecuanime y bastante complejo y bien simplificado: 4 acciones de combate + saltar y agacharse y 4 de dirección + 8 botones para las armas.
El control del personaje, el escenario y los enemigos estarán regidos y bien acoplados a este concepto para representar algo redondo y terminado.

Buena IA e imprevisibilidad mezclada con la anticipación y la multitud zombie. Enemigos y 8 armas muy característicos.
Escenario muy poco interactivo pero con mucha riqueza: el plataformeo simple se ve potenciado por el escenario y el control del personaje hasta valores muy altos, que se complementan a la jugabilidad.

22304847.review:
Los intocables de Eliot Ness + zombies + "Metal Slug". 

Un entretenido juego que, partiendo del estilo del "Metal Slug", nos sitúa en la piel de un matón afincado en la Nueva York de los años 20 enfrentado a una interminable legión de zombies. Gráficos simples, aunque resultones; música interesante aunque algo peñazo dada la larga duración de algunas fases; posibilidad de usar múltiples armas; un pelín de gore salpicón y un cierto toque de humor.

No es que sea ninguna maravilla, pero se juega sin problemas, aun cuando hubiese estado bien unas animaciones menos ortopédicas, mayor variedad de enemigos, unos sonidos más variados y la posibilidad de mejorar los atributos de las armas y del personaje, lo que hubiese disparado su rejugabilidad. De hecho, ahí reside su principal defecto porque, una vez te lo has hecho, no hay ningún aliciente que te invite a volverlo a jugar. Si, además, hubiesen dotado al juego de la posibilidad de tomar caminos alternativos, la cosa sería mucho mejor. 

A pesar de todo no es un mal juego si lo pillas barato.

22304352.review:
Le jeu est magnifique, il est fun. Le plaisir d'un run & gun avec le goût de la nostalgie, le tout dans une ambiance décalée très réussie. Le trio impropable zombies-mafia-prohibition marche très bien et on prend plaisir à utiliser les différentes armes qui ont un bon feeling, surtout lorsqu'un headshot se traduit par l'explosion de la tête de la cible arrosée d'une réplique bien sentie.  Le rythme et la courbe de difficulté sont bien gérés.

Tout commence bien pour Guns, Gore & Cannoli et  le fun reste jusqu'au bout. C'est-à-dire 3 heures en mode normal pour ma part : c'est trop court. Premier défaut et peut-être le plus gros s'il n'était pas accompagné par tous ses camarades qui laissent penser que les développeurs n'ont pas peaufiné leur jeu.

En vrac : des hitboxes parfois hasardeuses, une IA strawberry (vous me direz que dans ce type de jeu, OSEF, mais là on en est au mafieux qui court dans le mur tout en continuant de tirer), des situations injustes (par exemple des passages dans lesquels on est obligé de se faire toucher... au hasard un soldat lance-roquette qui tire à la seconde où sa main apparait à l'écran, le reste de son corps est hors de vue), quelques musiques bien répétitives et enfin le gameplay assez imprécis (bonne chance pour viser la tête dans une pente !). 

Exemple qui combine ces défauts: le passage quand on sort des égouts et que nous sommes poursuivis par des rats mais face à des soldats. Le passage est difficile, donc on meurt. Manque de bol la musique est répétitive : on se la tape en boucle jusqu'à avoir les nerfs à vif. Le passage est difficle oui, mais en partie à cause de l'injustice de la roquette hors champs et de l'imprécision. Impossible de bien toucher quelques ennemis sans se faire toucher à moins de spammer bêtement les grenades en croisant les doigts. Frustrant.

Donc oui on s'amuse le temps que ça dure, c'est court. Mais je ne sais pas si j'aurais aimé que ça dure plus longtemps avec tous ces défauts qui s'intensifient vers la fin. Dommage. 

Je recommande ce jeu, qui est à faire rien que pour sa DA, mais uniquement en solde, et pas à 10€.

22194319.review:
Ich werde versuchen "Guns,      
Gore and Cannoli" zuerst Objektiv zu beschreiben und später zu erklären, warum es aus meiner Sicht trotzdem ein gutes Spiel ist.
Der Klassische Sidescroller mit Jump&Gun Gameplay wurde im Herbst 2015 vom Belgischen Crazy Monkey Studio veröffentlicht und ist seit Ende April auch für PC verfügbar. Das Spiel gewann den Europäischen Indie spiele Preis für das beste Spiel und die beste Soundkulisse. 
Die Story: Man spielt als Vinnie Cannoli, einem Geldeintreiber für die Mafia, der von einem Mafiaboss (welcher aussieht wie Marlon Brando in "Der Pate") in die Stadt Thugtown (Ja, Thugtown ) bestellt wird um einen gewissen Frankie "the fly" zu finden. Doch aus irgendeinem Grund ist die Stadt von Zombies befallen und nur einige Gangster, die in der Stadt die Macht übernommen haben und das Militär, welches verzweifelt versucht einige Punkte zu halten, währen sich noch gegen die Zombies.
In den darauffolgenden (wenigen) 3 Stunden Kampagne Schießen und Treten wir uns mit bis zu 8 Waffen, darunter natürlich eine Thompson MP, eine Schrotflinte und ein Flammenwerfer durch die Stadt. Und natürlich kämpfen wir nicht nur gegen Zombies, sondern auch gegen Riesenratten, das Militär und die zwei Mafiabanden der Stadt.
Das Ganze ist sehr Blutig Inszeniert. Zombieköpfe Explodieren und versprühen Comic-Stil Blut durch die im Comic Stil gehaltene Stadtlandschaft, Ratten gehen in großen Flammen auf und sacken als Häufchen Asche zusammen und Mafia-Schläger bekommen Schrotsalbe für Schrotsalbe in den Bauch. Dabei dürfen natürlich nicht die obligatorischen platten Sprüche wie "Selling lead by the kilos in our Days" oder "Stop trying to eat me you freaking Zombies" fehlen.
Da die Story auch sehr Klitsche behaftet bleibt und es keinerlei neue Gameplay Innovationen gibt, bekommt das Spiel von Metakritik den eher mittelmäßigen Wert 74/100. Warum finde ich dieses Spiel also trotzdem gut?
Ganz einfach: Es macht nichts Falsch. Der 2D - Comic-Look ist konsequent, die Maps sind gut und Abwechslungsreich gestaltet, das Gameplay ist immer spannend und fordernd, doch nie unfair und es gibt mehr unterschiedliche Vorgehensweißen als bei "The Division". Die Story ist teilweiße doch überraschend. Nette Partikel- und Zerstörungseffekte runden es Grafisch ab und die fröhliche, in jedem Level unterschiedliche, 20er Jahre Jazz/Dixi Musik gibt dem ganzen Spiel einen Selbstironischen touch. 
Überhaupt ist Selbstironie eine der großen Stärken des Spieles, was es zu einem erfrischenden, entspannenden Spielgefühl macht. Klitsches werden von der Story bewusst bedient, die Gewalt Karikiert und Sprüche wie "Eat me! - No, wait - Stop eating me!" machen das Spiel einfach großartig.  Denn nichts ist Schlimmer, als Spiele, die wie Battlefield oder CoD immer mit dieser Pseudo-bedeutungsvollen Ernsthaftigkeit versuchen oder zwanghaften pseudo Humor, beim Spieler Emotionen hervorzurufen.
Und das Beste an diesem Spiel ist, dass man es im Koop an einem PC oder einer X-Box spielen kann. Und das Ganze geht ausgesprochen gut und macht mit bis zu vier Spielern auch echt Spaß. Guns, Gore and Cannoli hat einen hohen wiederspielwert, was es gut für zwischendurch und zu einem sehr lustigen Party Spiel macht. 
Auch wenn das Spiel noch nicht von der FSK eingestuft wurde, kann ich es niemandem empfehlen, der unter 12 ist und/oder Ironie sowie Karikaturen nicht erkennen kann, da für solche die Genialität des Spieles nicht erkennbar ist und der Gewaltgrad zu hoch. 
Das Spiel kostet 9,99€, ist auf Steam verfügbar, soll neben PC und X-Box auch noch für die PS 4 erscheinen und läuft auf den Schulnetbooks.
In dem Sinne, 11 von 10 Sizilianischen  Süßgebäcken und mir bleibt nurnoch zu sagen: "Put that gun away, Vinnie - but wait -no, pick it up again, you will need it!".

22186486.review:
Покупалась игра исключительно для прохождения за одним компом. Но даже в этом случае, играть было не очень уж и интересно. С этого и начну.
Представьте мафию. Теперь представьте зомби. Теперь представьте мой пароль от стима. Забудьте.

Тема зомби, которая уже изжила себя лет так 8 назад, на сей раз ворвалась в мафию. Ну, такого, вроде бы, я еще не видел. Так как я брал ее для кооператива за одним компом, то и рассказывать буду, как в паре было  играть.

Один персонаж - мафиози в черном, другой - в белом. Конечно же, среди всего мяса, которое на вас лезет во время игры, белого персонажа куда проще найти, нежели черного. Но, помимо зомби-противников, так же появляется мафия с другого райончика, персонажи которых [i](некоторые)[/i] - это вылитый ваш черный персонаж, которого всегда путаешь с врагом. Неужели при тесте игры не возникло догадок поменять пиджачок нашему парнишке?..

Геймплей в игре очень разнообразный - нужно бежать вправо, всех убивать, сражаться с боссом. Это, вроде бы, философия почти всех игр подобного жанра. Да, игра приятно нарисована, слава мне не в 3𝐃, есть разнообразные враги (еще бы им не быть), большой выбор оружия [i](от пистолета до мега-тесла-уничтожителя-всех-и-вся). А что? Мафиози знают толк в развлечениях. [/i]

Всего в игре будет 4 босса, 3 последних не такие уж и простые, хотя мы играли на среднем уровне сложности. Энивей, было весело. Игра коротка, но это даже хорошо в этом случае, ибо разнообразие в ней однообразно. 

Что самое странное, так это то, что ролики все вверх тормашками. Не понял, какая в этом фишка, когда не понимаешь ничего, пытаясь при этом читать субтитры. Сами себе палку в колеса, так сказать... Это, конечно же, послужило причиной пропуска роликов, во избежание косоглазия, посему о сюжете я ни сном ни духом, может оно и к лучшему. Ну какой сюжет может быть в игре про мафию и зомби?...

Ну а так, это скорее печальный проект, чем что-то хорошее. Один я в это точно не стал бы играть. Количество положительных обзоров мне тоже не понятно, но хотя чего удивляться, когда допускаются обзоры вроде - игра супер пачаны налетай [i](сыграно 0.3 часа)[/i].

Существует куча хороших аналогов, где есть приятное разнообразие. Вот на них и стоит обратить внимание, а это так.... 

[b]4/10[/b]

22162921.review:
[h1]Alte 2D Arcade Baller-Schule[/h1]

Guns, Gore & Cannoli ist ein sehr gelungener, lustiger und puristischer 2D-Sidescroll Zombie Shooter, im Stil der Metal Slug Reihe, mit einer Garantie für blutige Pixelexplosionen, bis zum Abwinken. Man bedient sich dafür an einem Arsenal aus acht Waffen, die man wechseln bzw. nachladen muss, so dass die Arcade-Action nicht zu einem reinen Dauerfeuer-Jump&Run verkommt. Ein angenehm steigender Schwierigkeitsgrad, gut gesetzte Kontrollpunkte und Gesundheitspacks, sowie ordentliche Bosse, schaffen es Funlevel zu halten und gar zu steigern. 

Besonders das Artdesign hat mich immer wieder animiert weiterzuzocken. Handgezeichnet und liebevoll animiert, verwischen die Grenzen zwischen Gameplay und Zwischensequenzen zu einem kleinen interaktiven Zeichentrickfilm. Ein Eindruck, der durch einen äußerst gelungenen Soundtrack, sowie sehr guter Sprachausgabe unterstrichen wird und den stimmigen Gesamteindruck abrunden. 


[b]Gefällt mir:[/b]
+  2D-Balleraction nach alter Schule
+  pechschwarzer Humor
+  tolles Artdesign
+  gute u. fordernde Bosskämpfe
+  Koop für bis zu vier Spieler

[b]Gefällt mir nicht:[/b]
-  eingeschränkte Schussmechanik (nur seitwärts)


Für mich der beste Side-Scroller, der mir bisher untergekommen ist ..! Klare Kaufempfehlung.
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=643197392

22144989.review:
Hallo interressierte Gamer.

Guns, Gore & Cannoli ist warscheinlich eines dieser Spiele, die einfach gespielt werden müssen, damit das ganze Potential zum vorschein kommt ( gut bei einem 2d scroller vllcht etwas übertrieben ABER ....) .
Das Setting hat mich von Anfang an gefesselt (Mafia vs Zombies in den 1920rn !!! im Comiclook) hat es so  glaube ich noch nicht gegeben:).
zum Game selber : Ballern bis auch die letzten Zombies, Gangster, Soldaten oder Mutationen nicht wieder aufstehen.
Die Waffenauswahl reicht von den geliebten Klassikern wie Magnum, Schrotflinte( Doppellauf oder Pump) bis hin zu ausgefallenen Sachen wie eine zur Waffe umfunktionierten Teslaspule ( oder halt nur ein übergroßer Taser :) wie mann will ). Was im Einzelplayermodus schon recht cool ist macht zu viert im Local co-op tatsächlich soviel Fun & Laune das ich dafür echt so einige Großproduktionen liegen lassen würde (und dass meine ich ernst!!!!).
Ich bin tatsächlich überrascht was aus so einem simplen Konstrukt raus zuholen ist. Hut  ab an die Entwickler!!!
So Geile Ideen und Games müssen unterstützt werden, denn für mich steht jetzt schon fest (nach 4std . ) ICH WILL EINE FORTSETZUNG UND EINE VERFILMUNG( ja richtig gelesen). Ich hoffe wirklich das einige diesem kleinen Schmuckstück eine faire Chance geben ( was kann mann für 5€ im Sale falsch machen ??? ). Also viel Spass mit dieser kleinen aber feinen Perle. mfg NHB (ich bitte um Vergebung für evtl. vorhandene Rechtschreibfehler )

Fun straight forward shoot-em-up, in old school style. Animations are nice, and make the game look better than just screenshots. 

It has nice humour to it, and simple and easy-to-pickup shooter gameplay. This is easy enough to learn for casual gamers, but still enough challenge. It's not a deep game, but different difficulty levels (from easy to impossible), guns, and enemy types etc. bring enough challenge. The graphics aren't flashy, but they have a clear look to them. Unlike in some games, like Monaco - What's yours is mine or Broforce, which is very hard to follow because graphics are just bad. Or pixel graphics, I hate pixel graphics. This however was pretty good, like a very violent cartoon.

21596923.review:
[b]Guns, Gore & Cannoli ist ein lustiger 2D all you can shoot Side-Scroller in handgezeichneter Comic Grafik.[/b]

"If you didn't wanna die, you shouldn't have walked in front of my gun"

[h1]Story[/h1]
Es ist 1920 und Vinnie Cannoli ist auf der Suche nach Frankie the Fly, der in Thugtown bei den Bonninos untergetaucht ist. Dort hat es am St Patrick' s Day Unruhen gegeben, heisst es. Aufständische hätten die Polizei angegriffen. Das Militär musste anrücken. Seit Tagen bekommt man keine Nachrichten mehr aus Thugtown, doch Vinnie hat keine Wahl. Mr Bellucio hat keinen Zweifel daran gelassen, dass er eine Menge mit Frankie zu besprechen hat und Mr Bellucio ist ein viel zu wohlhabender Mann, als dass man ihm einen Wunsch abschlagen könnte. Der wusste, dass das kein Spaziergang werden würde, sonst hätte er nicht Vinnie damit beauftragt. Die Bonninos haben einen Strip Club in der Stadt und der ist natürlich Vinnies erstes Ziel...

[h1]Umfang[/h1]
In etwa 3-4 Stunden kann man die Kampagne theoretisch beenden, praktisch braucht man je nach Schwierigkeitsgrad wahrscheinlich eher 4-6 Stunden. Lokal lässt sich die Kampagne mit bis zu vier Spielern auf vier verschiedenen Schwierigkeitsgraden spielen. Außerdem bietet GG&C noch einen Versus Modus, im dem bis zu vier Spieler in einem Deathmatch gegeneinander antreten können.

[h1]Gameplay[/h1]
Ganz wie man es aus diesem Genre gewohnt ist, ist auch GG&C nicht ganz einfach. Das Ende eines Levels zu finden, ist kein Problem. Das Problem sind die Zombies, die Bonnino Mafia, das Militär und mehr als nur ein paar angriffslustige mutierte Riesenratten, die Vinnie auf seinem Weg zu Frankie the Fly das Leben schwer machen wollen. Vinnie hat eine Pistole mit unendlich Munition, aber er kann auch Waffen aufsammeln, die dann allerdings nur begrenzt Munition haben. Ein besonderes Highlight sind der Flammerwerfer und die Tesla Stromwaffe.

An einigen Stellen gibt es animierte Zwischensequenzen, die durchgehend gut gelungen sind. 

Hin und wieder tauchen Endgegner auf, die richtig anstrengend sein können. Sie folgen aber einem ziemlich offensichtlichen Bewegungs- und Angriffsmuster. Man kann sie besiegen, wenn man genau aufpasst.

Für meine Begriffe spielt sich das Spiel am besten mit einem Controler.

[h1]Grafik & Sound[/h1]
Die lustige Comicgrafik ist der Hit. Alles wurde liebevoll mit der Hand gezeichnet. Der Stil erinnert ein bißchen an die Serie "American Dad".

Im Hintergrund laufen italienische, meist leicht melancholische Volksweisen, die den Spieler im Walzer- oder Swingrythmus der Zwanziger durch die endlosen Wellen von Gegnern begleiten. Der Kontrast ist großartig. Das Voice Acting ist ebenfalls top, besonders der italienische Akzent hat mir gut gefallen.

[h1]Kritik[/h1]
Guns Gore & Cannoli ist sehr kurz. Ich will mehr davon!

Leider gibt es nur einen Speicherpunkt für die Kampagne. Wenn man also irgendwo feststeckt, kann man keinen früheren Speicherpunkt laden, sondern man muss von vorne beginnen. Das ist auch problematisch, wenn man mal mit einem Freund spielen möchten, während man gerade in der Solokampagne steckt. Spielen kann man, nur geht dann leider der Speicherpunkt aus der Solokampagne verloren. Spart es einem wirklich so viel Programmierarbeit, nur einen Speicherpunkt für ein Spiel zu haben? Aus meiner Sicht wurde hier an der falschen Stelle gespart. Ein Speicherpunkt für Singleplayer und einer für Multiplayer ist absolutes Minimum.

Es würde noch mehr Spaß machen, wenn man GG&C auch online mit Freunden spielen könnte, aber das kann man dem Spiel nicht wirklich vorwerfen. Vermutlich wäre es dann auch deutlich teurer geworden.

Ich fand nicht, dass es viel zu kritisieren gibt. Das Spiel läuft stabil, ist  bugfrei (soweit ich das beurteilen konnte) und macht höllisch Spaß.

[h1]Fazit[/h1]
Ich mag Zombiespiele und dieses hier ist ein besonderer Leckerbissen. Guns Gore & Cannoli ist ein lustiges Mafia Epos und ein 2D Shooter mit einzigartiger Comic Grafik, jeder Menge Action und pechschwarzem Humor. Dieses Spiel ist mit Abstand der beste Side-Scroller, der mir bisher untergekommen ist und deshalb eine eindeutige Kaufempfehlung für alle 2D jump & run & shoot them up Fans da draußen.

21495130.review:
Já měl vždy rád prostředí mafiánů. Ať už za to může filmová trilogie Kmotra, či hra z našich luhů a hájů Mafia. Ovšem Crazy Monkey Studio přišli s něčím inovativním. Se skloubením mafiánského prostředí a zombie nákazy.

Guns, Gore&Cannoli je kombinací plošinovky a střílečky, při níž jde jen o jedno – probít se přes hordy mrtváků, aniž byste zemřeli. Prolít hektolitry krve a u toho se zabavit.

Začněme příběhem, který, no jak to říct, zkrátka není to pravé ořechové. Je to vedené stylem: „Já jsem zatracenej Vince Cannoli a toto je zatracený město Thugtown a všechny ty zombíky rozstřílím na zatracený malý kousíčky!“ Hlubší smysl v tom nehledejte. Ano, některé náznaky příběhu ta hra má, jako například různé zvraty, či komické situace, ale těch je minimum. Jelikož Cannoli je mafián, jak se patří, tak musí samozřejmě za sebou, krom rozstřílených mrtváků, zanechávat i spoustu rádoby vtipných hlášek.

Grafická stránka hry by se dala vychvalovat. Je skvělá. Mně osobně se tento styl kreslené grafiky zatraceně zamlouvá a hraní je v něm natolik svižné. Ovšem, když rozstřelíte auto a ty dveře od vozidla se tedy otáčí, než spadnou, tak by to nemuselo problikávat. Působí to pak nedodělaným a hnusným dojmem.

A jak se Guns, Gore&Cannoli vlastně hraje? To víte, zkrátka běžíte, střílíte, krčíte se, házíte granátem,… a to je všechno. Postupy neustále opakujete, až se hra stává monotónní. Řítí se na vás hordy zomboňů a vy pomocí svých devíti zbraní, které získáváte postupem hrou, s nimi nemáte problém.

Když jsem nakousnul zbraně, tak ty jsou různorodé. Máme zde základní pistol, která udělá sotva škrábanec, až po upilovanou, či normální brokovnici, plamenomet, až po cosi co vydává elektrické šoky. Opravdu, v pestré paletě zbraní si najde své oblíbence. Ovšem jste nuceni stále využívat zbraně všechny, jelikož potvor je hodně a nábojů málo.

Pokud si myslíte, že budete ale bojovat jen proti zombiím, tak jste na omylu! Ostatní gangsteři, ač bojují o své přežití se zombíky, tak jdou i po vás, jelikož pan Bellucio, hlavní kápo celého Thugtown podsvětí, plánuje odletět ze zamořeného města ve veliké vzducholodi. Do toho tam je i armáda, která Thugtown pomalu vylidňuje. A samozřejmě, jelikož se podíváte i do kanálů, tak narazíte na všemožné krysy. Ať už by se jednalo o ty malé, téměř neškodné, nebo o ty velké a ty větší, se kterými není radno si zahrávat.

Bossfighty jsou na tom bídně, respektive jsou dělány na stejném principu, kdy máme plošiny a na ty plošiny různě skáčeme, uhýbáme výstřelům bosse a přitom do něj dáváme vlastní salvu. Jednou to je dobré, ale když to stejné opakujete potřetí, tak už to je otravné.

Soundtrack je přizpůsobený na 20.-30. léta minulého století a není vůbec špatný, avšak při tomto stylu hry spíše nudí. Mezitímco vy zabíjíte desítky potvor, tak vám v pozadí hraje poklidný jazz. Nakonec to můžete udělat, jako já a zapnout si Spotify a při hraní vašeho oblíbeného interpreta se pořádně ponořit do této řezničiny.
Shrňme si to – střílečka, která krom skloubení gangsterky a zombie střílečky, nepřináší nic nového. Opakujete stále to stejné, až to začne být monotónní a nudné. Z hry se tak stává jen ten odkládací titul, který si zahrajete z nudy o víkendu.
PS: Hrajte v hlavně v COOPu

21407078.review:
Guns, Gore & Cannoli（枪、血＆黑手党）
作为一个有着恶搞精神的游戏，从这个游戏名和游戏里的主人公Vinnie Cannoli（维尼 柯诺里）的名字就能看出来了，在游戏里反复被提到的Cannoli实际上是一个来自西西里的意式小吃，翻译过来的名字是甜馅奶油煎饼卷，这是这款游戏和游戏主人公的名字，也是游戏里唯一的回血道具（一次可以回复一大半生命值）
（查了一下图片发现这个小吃我居然还吃过，好吃极了，虽然奶油比较多可能搞的油乎乎的。。）

剧情：故事发生在1920年左右（按照游戏里的场景应该是在1926之后，1930之前这一段时间），美国的Thugtown（罪城）出现了一些奇怪的事，报纸上的报道荒诞到令人难以相信。西西里黑手党人维尼 柯诺里（Vinnie Cannoli）被雇用进入罪城完成他的雇主交给他的任务，结果发现罪城已经成了活死人的天堂，而且美国军队和其他不怀好意的帮派正打着各自的如意算盘，试试在黑手党、军队和僵尸横行的罪城生存下去吧。

画面：满满的美漫风，血腥却又不令人感到恶心，人物换子弹一类的细节做的很不错，作为一款横版通关的游戏我觉得完全可以给好评。

游戏性：在这个游戏里你既要对付僵尸，还要对付穷凶极恶的黑手党和装备精良的美国军队。从杀戮僵尸到激烈的枪战都具备，至于你的武器，从最基本的柯尔特手枪到具有浓重科幻色彩的特斯拉电磁炮样样俱全，用你最喜欢的方法歼灭敌人吧。

音乐：同样是黑帮风格，大量萨克斯和小号演奏的音乐，给游戏带来了一丝欢乐的感觉

这游戏是一个来自比利时的独立游戏，不得不说相当不错，价格也不算贵，在打折时候27买的，不过我觉得即使原价买了也很值，希望开发者能继续努力带来续作或者其他作品。

好评走起

NICE GAME!

21074702.review:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1iCWZuRINb8

     Guns, Gore & Cannoli is a 2d side screen scroller action shooter in a mobster/mafia/ post apocalyptic zombie world. The music does an excellent job of connecting all the aspects of this game together, and tailors each section very well to what is happening on the screen. The theme of the game is less about the zombies, and more about a mafia gangster from that era in history, and you feel like a badass hitman striving to complete your mission. One thing to note is that while the game does offer a co-op option, there is no ease of access in how to add a player; there is no interface via steam, an no friends list. It's not as simplistic as it should be, which is a shame.

     The weapons that you play with have weight behind them, with each weapon having strengths and weaknesses depending upon the enemy you are facing. There are also Molotov cocktails, flame throwers, and rocket launchers for more specialized attacks. I go over each individual weapon in the video summary, if you are interested in more details. The only issue I had with the weapons would be if the game offered upgrades to weapons to increase damage, accuracy, or reload time, which would encourage replay-ability. 

     The platforming is more basic, but not disrespectful to your time. The different elements within the world and the different themes of the maps fit in perfectly with what you were being asked to do. There are a multitude of save points and health so that you don't lose much progress when you die. Enemies will come from behind you, but nothing randomly or continuously spawns in, so you do feel a sense of progression. There is no fall damage, which can be beneficial when you fall, so you don't die, but also can be detrimental to the game, as when you knock a zombie off a building for example, you don't get to see them go 'splat'!

    The story in the game is surprising; the cut-scenes and aesthetic does a good job of connecting you to the character. The voice acting as well does a good job of making you feel like a badass mafia enforcer who goes in to get the tough jobs done. It conveys a good sense of purpose with what you are doing.

     The game give you action at a steady stream.The story isn't award winning, but is entertaining. The platforming and the weapons both give you a feeling of accomplishment and progression. The game does an excellent job of providing and excelling at what they promised, and it's an easy recommend. 


Thanks for your viewership and support; for more videos click here.
https://www.youtube.com/c/SocioPsycho

有成为神作的可能，但可惜因为不合理的游戏设定，不明所以的武器平衡，诡异的难度，奇葩的敌人设定都毁了这款游戏。
本作有飞在空中的敌人，但没有向上瞄准。
本作有换弹系统，缺少爽快感；很难分辨手雷和掉在地上的弹夹，而手雷有击飞效果，后期敌人又太多，很难去躲手雷，结果就是你被炸得在天上飞来飞去。
本作的武器很多，但平衡很差，射速慢，装弹6发的手炮要两枪才能干掉一个敌人，而装弹8发子弹的霰弹枪要三枪，两者伤害差不多；其实这款游戏里除冲锋枪外所有武器伤害都差不多。
敌人设计极其恶心，橄榄球运动员又硬又能把你撞飞，还有会飞扑的小老鼠，丢木桶的大胖子(大金刚？)，气球邮差，正面无敌的盾兵等等，更别说那些会扔手雷的普通敌人，这游戏后期别想感受到爽快。
我给6分，可以一试的平庸之作。

Has the thought of a life of crime during a zombie apocalypse ever appealed to you? Probably not but heck give this game a go anyway.

Step back into the roaring 1920’s and face off against Johnny law and the prohibition. Of course Johnny law has decided that normal crime fighting is going to lose the war on booze so where else would they turn? Zombies of course. Step into the shoes of Vinnie, the wise cracking sociopath with a penchant for death and a hankering for Cannoli’s.

This game is more fun than you can shake a stick at. Face off against hoards of the undead that come in all shapes and sizes. Want foul smelling football players or whip cracking corpse call girls, this game has it all. And not only the walking dead either, you have a fair share of gangsters, mutant rats and a soldiers to boot. All of which can be dispatched using your large array of assorted armaments.

The comic book art style adds to the humour and leads to a truly unique experience, in my opinion anyway. The jokes are pretty good, the story is detailed and presented in a way that makes you want to play through to the finish and see how the truly disastrous adventure ends. The varied environments add to the overall doomed feeling of the city and its damned inhabitants. The score was nice and really lended to the time period.

A particular note of interest that I had were the many varied ways you could kill your foes and the animations they brought about. I loved how much detail was put into the game and how each of the more unique weapons had its own way of melting, burning or blasting enemies to puddles, ash or guts respectively. 

This game is a riot and I had a great time with it. I would recommend this game to anyone even at full price. Also if you want a challenge try for the achievements, some of them are more nightmarish than a city full of blood thirsty undead.

Have Fun ^_^

20055458.review:
First of all: this is a very good side-scrolling shooter. The four-hour campaign is fine. Why the negative review, then? Because there are currently very few of them, and they don't address my issues with the game and why I find it so annoying.

Let's start with the good: the (cartoony) graphics are great, and the game is a pretty solid game, mechanically speaking. You have to go to the right killing every enemy in your way... or just running past them when the enemies just pile up and you are tired of replaying the same section. (Yes, sometimes I got bored and just ran to the next checkpoint as in a bad Call of Duty level.)

What's my problem with it, then? Well, the game tries to be edgy... and fails. I'm not even criticizing how the game goes for a cartoony visual style that seems fit for kids but in a world where every headshot just blows a head clean off... No, the problem is that the waffer-thin story is not well told, just jumping from one cliché to another (Mobsters! Zombies! Your boss is Vito Corleone! There's a German mad professor!), and the main character is an amoral killing machine that is oblivious to what happens around him, and in the end he's even glad that everybody died because he made it out alive and with a lot of money. "Ha, ha, seems like a good plan!"

Do you enjoy playing as somebody you don't like at all? I didn't enjoy Watch_Dogs because Aidan Pierce was a complete tool, but your mileage may vary. Also, the efficient but frankly annoying voiceover here goes for the most over-the-top Italian American clichés, and hearing how the main character named "Cannolli" enjoys eating "cannolli" to regain health got old immediately because no, it's not clever. Hey, but maybe none of this annoys you, you just skip the (longish) cutscenes and you don't care who you are shooting and why (first you just kill zombies, and then éven your own mob pals, because why not? Explaining what happened to them would take too much effort). "No, I don't care that it's so moronic, I just love mindless shooting." Well, here's some bad news, then: you can't just play this like you play Metal Slug.

If you expected to play this an old-school "just fire away" shooter, forget it... You have to be very aware of how much ammo you have and the next weapon you are using (the game just switches automatically and silently to another weapon that may not be too useful against the type of zombie you are currently fighting), because otherwise the zombies will run up to you, grab you (you can't jump away unless you kick them first) and then it's game over. Because of all the possible combinations of weapons and zombie types, sometimes the game feels like a puzzle and you have to be very careful.

But what you have to be most aware of is the timing when you reload. The game, for some reason, chooses to be realistic in its approach to reloading and it takes *really* long, which seems fair, I guess, but not really when you are reloading your pump-action shotgun one shell at a time and your walking Mafia stereotype just can't stop doing it and shoot away when he sees a zombie approaching, unlike any other shooter with pump-action shotguns in history.

TL:DR:

-It looks very good, but you may NOT like this game if you want a good story and mindless shooting.
-Some aspects of the game are VERY annoying.
-It has some great shooting mechanics, but the game is too punishing at times. You may like it a lot if you enjoy challenges.

I think a demo would be quite useful for this game. But that's why we have Steam Refunds now, right? You may be encouraged to try it when even this negative review agrees that it's a good game...

19309933.review:
El padrino según George A. Romero

¿Qué pasa si metemos a "Metal Slug" y a "Left 4 dead" en una coctelera? Pues que tendremos un combinado de ación que se llama GUNS GORE & CANNOLI y que bueno está tío!
Solo hace faltar ver un par de trailer o gameplays para saber que es un juegazo y cuando lo juegas, todo lo que imaginabas se cumple: acción a raudales contra ordas de zombis, infectados especiales, sin olvidar la guerra entra bandas de mafiosos, varios protagonistas con los que jugar, gran gama de armas pasando por pistolas, escopetas, lanzallamas, granadas y otras sorpesas. Existe un buen diseño de niveles, con estilo artístico y graficos muy simpáticos. 

El juego nos permite el cooperativo hasta 4 jugadores desde un mismo PC, pero no en online. Cuenta con una dificuldad ajustable para gusto del consumidor. Pasando por el apartado sonoro decir que posee buena banda sonora característica del género gansters.
A resumidas cuentas, Guns, Gore & Cannoli es un estupendo título porque es divertido y adictivo hasta decir basta. No vas a parar de darle caña en una buena temporada. Ya se ha convertido en todo un clásico del genéro. 
Cuando salgas a la calle, ponte tu gabardina y besa a tu escopeta, hace un día de perros ahí fuera.  

Lo mejor: zombis, armas, dificultad ajustable, sonido, adicción, muy rejugable.
Lo peor: gusta tanto que queremos más niveles. Le falta cooperativo online

19293584.review:
Guns, Gore & Cannoli é um sólido side-scrolling shoot-em-up, mas poderia ter sido fantástico. 

Uma das coisas que marca todos os grandes shoot-em-ups é que eles nunca quebram seu ritmo acelerado. Encontrei algumas frustrações nos movimentos em relação as suas muitas escadas, que fez exatamente isso. Em vez de inclinar o seu movimento para subir ou descer escadas, você tem que seguir em frente e cair para descer ou saltar sobre as escadas para subir. É uma mecânica um pouco estranha, que requer algum tempo para se acostumar e dificulta o progresso na ocasião.

Fora isso, o jogo flui muito bem. A ação é envolvente e desafiadora, em grande parte devido à quantidade de mobs e uma lista versátil de tipos de inimigos. Se você pode viver com pequenas falhas, este jogo run-and-gun vale o seu tempo e dinheiro!

Godfather + Metal Slug + Zombies = Gun, Gore, and Cannoli

Come gioco a scorrimento 2D mi è piaciuto veramente tanto.

[b]-Animazioni[/b] fluide e disegnate a mano da come ho visto, hanno veramente fatto un ottimo lavoro.
Pure quando si muore si avranno diverse animazioni di morte (ovviamente dipende da come muori).
Unica pecca (piccolissima, sapete che io sono un rompipalle) è che quando muori tramite l'acido si vede la stessa animazione di come muore uno zombie tramite l'acido, infatti per 1 nanosecondo si vede che diventi uno zombie per un frame mentre vieni sciolto.

[b]-L'atmosfera[/b] anche l'ho trovata molto piacevole con parecchi livelli: Porto, Fabbriche , Club, e molti altri.
Mi è piaciuta l'idea che hanno messo il classico sicario in un mondo apocalittico zombie.

[b]-Il gameplay[/b] come ho detto è a scorrimento 2D, vagamente ricorda metal slug, ma più lento.
 Ci sono diversi tipi di zombie, diversi tipi di mafiosi, e anche diversi tipi di militari, ci saranno tanti nemici in questo gioco 

In un gioco così inizialmente pensavo bhè ci saranno 2 massimo 3 armi, invece ne ha 9, cacchio come un fps arena, che figata! 
A livello di difficoltà pure essa molto buona, dovrete impegnarvi un pochino pure in modalità normale

[b]-La musica[/b] pure mi è piaciuta , da canzoni jazz, tarantella italiana, e adirittura il tema di "When Johnny Comes Marching Home" ci stanno bene (anche se non sono musiche originali)


Ma parti negative le ha sto gioco? eh ovviamente si.

[b]Purtroppo anche la mancanza della coop online è una pecca[/b] (Potete giocarlo in locale con un vostro amico e funziona tutto perfettamente).

E la pecca più grande sicuramente è la [b]longevità, dura poco... sulle 4-5 ore[/b] probabilmente riuscirete a finirlo.

Bhè che dire ... se vi piacciono i giochi a scorrimento, i mafiosi anni 20 e gli zombie allora questo gioco fà a caso vostro.
Non lo suggerisco a prezzo pieno per la sua longevità, ma già dai 6 euro in giù secondo me li vale.

[h1]7.4[/h1]

18648775.review:
Very quickly, I recommend this game with a caveat, I cannot recommend buying at full price. If you get cheaply or in a bundle, its a fun, playable little romp.

A quick summarization of the plot of this game is simple, you're a mob hitman who has a job for your boss and the location is infested of the job is infested with zombies. Not much else to say! Its a fairly well crafted 2D sidescroller with some very nice art, passable voice acting, and music that fits the time period.

My playtime is a bit skewed. At the time of this review, I have 4.8 hours into the game, but that is double my actual playtime as I was about to finish the main game around the 2.5 hour mark, but an update broke my save so I had to start over again. It's length leaves a lot to be desired needless to say. 

Pros:

+ It looks great. The artwork alone is enough reason to install this game.
+ Its fun. There's a decent variety of weapons throughout the game and blasting zombies stays fun. It has a lot of classic side scroller elements that bring back the old days with a modern coat of paint.
+ The level design is fairly varied.
+ There is traditional side scroller challenge to bosses that is reminscent of similar games from back in the day.

Cons:

- Extremely short. Almost insultingly so.
- Local co-op only in a game that is screaming for online multi. It's 2015, not 1994.
- Low replayability.

This game deserves to be lauded for the heart that went into it. I really loved the artwork in virtually every respect. I could nitpick some aspects, but I don't think that would be fair because it succeeds in making a light hearted 2D zombie game within an era that is represented very well by the work that went into it. However, as I stated in my opening, I do not feel this game is worth the regular price of admission. It just doesn't provide enough gameplay if someone is on a limited budget. A multiplayer mode and some more depth to the single player game would go a long way in justifying its price point a bit more.

Verdict: 6/10. Its good at what it is and worth playing, but its definitely something to wait to get on the cheap.

18619961.review:
This game has a good variety of enemies and scenarios and the art style is fantastic. The harder enemies require either a specific weapon to effectively kill them or a specific tactic. The movements and sections seem somewhat repetitive but it's a side scrolling game and I don't think that could be any other way. The way the developer changes up the enemies from one climbing stair section to the next or changes obstacles around, makes each step new. 

I found this game pretty addictive the first time I played it and it was 3 a.m. on a work night before I felt like stopping. The game has a decent checkpoint layout and that makes it seem like bite-sized segments and I wanted to keep going. My only complaint about the game is that it is difficult to change directions quickly, especially when crouched and surrounded by fast moving zombies. 

Overall the game beats the old 80's side-scrolling games that I used to play in the arcade. I even found an old friend from the 80's in the game as well when I saw R2-D2 next to a trashcan in the foreground of an early level. Nice touch Crazy Monkey Studios.

18603026.review:
Doom is a timeless game because it is, for all intents and purposes, perfect. The gunplay is satisfying because every weapon is balanced to the point where any weapon can be used throughout the entire game. Enemy variety ties directly into gunplay, offering appropriate challenges without being OHKO bulletsponges. In other words, when I play Doom, I expect to walk into a room full of imps and pinky demons, and circle-strafe with the weapon of my choice until they are all dead.

Guns, Gore, & Cannoli is not Doom, yet adopts its own sense of timelessness and “perfection” in its faithfulness to the SHUMP genre, as well as Crazy Monkey Studios’ commitment to quality presentation. Though lacking in secret rooms and power-ups, GG&C lasts long enough to provide a great experience in mayhem and gunplay, and I can easily see myself returning for higher difficulty and challenge runs (read: ACHIEVEMENTS). For fans of SHUMPs and video games in general, I would highly recommend GG&C. There isn’t much better out there, but there’s certainly a lot worse.

Full Review at [url=http://www.geeksundergrace.com/gaming/review-guns-gore-cannoli-pc/] Geeks Under Grace[/url]

18186647.review:
Mais um jogo de zumbis, quem quer? Ok, existem muitos, mas quantos são de plataforma? Ok, já deu pra reduzir muito... agora, quantos usam temática de máfia italiana? Só esse!

O jogo situa-se na cidade fictícia de Thugtown em 1925, durante o período de Lei Seca nos Estados Unidos, você acompanhará os passos do gangster durão Vinnie Cannoli, que é enviado à cidade pelo seu chefão, Mr. Belluccio, com a missão de localizar um tal de Frankie.

A campanha do jogo é composta por 12 capítulos, e é um tanto curta, sendo possível finalizá-la em menos de 3 horas. Ao finalizar um capítulo, você poderá revisitá-lo na seleção de capítulos.

Certamente é o grande ponto-fraco do jogo seja a ausência de progressões em geral. Nada de sistema de nível, nem pontuação, nem mesmo itens escondidos nas fases, que são extremamente lineares.

Talvez a única forma de progressão no jogo sejam as armas: você começará com apenas uma, e ao longo da campanha, liberará 8 armas extras, além de granadas e molotovs.

O jogo não possui mira com mouse ou algo do gênero, sendo possível mirar apenas para os dois lados do personagem. Como o jogo faz diferença o local onde você acerta inimigos (sim, tem headshots), você notará que cada arma possui uma precisão e altura de onde as balas saem. Milagrosamente, a altura da arma inicial é a cabeça dos inimigos.

Em muitas situações de plataforma, você deverá pular e atirar no ar para acertar inimigos, esconder-se agachando atrás de objetos, e assim por diante.

Algo surpreendente para esse tipo de jogo é que as armas possuem um pente, e precisam ser recarregadas. A pistola inicial possui munição infinita, mas todas as outras armas possuem munição limitada, e cada arma possui seu próprio tipo de munição.

Outro comando inusitado do jogo é o chute. Além de poder ser usado para abrir portas e acionar alavancas, é um recurso muito útil em combate, especialmente contra zumbis. Ao chutar um zumbi, ele será empurrado para trás, dando um espaço para respirar um pouco e reagir. Você pode chutar muitos zumbis de uma vez, se estiverem próximos.

Sempre que você atira num inimigo, ele fica atordoado por um pequeno tempo, sem reação. Dessa forma, é possível manter um inimigo parado sem ser uma ameaça, se você atingi-lo em sequência.

Você também sofre ao levar golpes, ficando lento por um pequeno intervalo. Por isso, é importante reagir com chute contra zumbis que estão próximos, pois você não conseguirá fugir correndo e pulando assim que eles chegam até você e te atacam.

O jogo possui gráficos muito belos, apesar dos traçados simples e cartunescos, utilizam muita iluminação e sombreamento. Os cenários são extremamente detalhados, contribuindo tanto para ambientação quanto para a beleza do jogo.

A interface é extremamente compacta, escondendo os ícones de armas na maior parte do tempo, e faz o seu papel muito bem.

O destaque vai para as animações dos personagens, desenhadas à mão, que retratam com detalhes todos seus movimento, ações, e inclusive sua morte, de forma muito fluída.

A música do jogo é extremamente temática, e encaixa-se muito bem com a ambientação do jogo. Os sons são bons, mas geralmente obstruem a própria música.

A melhor parte é a dublagem durante as cutscenes, que contribuem para a caracterização dos personagens, e torna-as mais divertidas ainda.

Guns, Gore & Cannoli pode ser jogado cooperativamente em até 4 jogadores locais. Para isso, na tela de gerenciamento de jogadores anterior às fases, você deve Adicionar jogadores utilizando seu respectivo item no menu.

Após adicionar o número de jogadores desejado, você deverá atribuir os controles a serem utilizados para cada um deles.

Também é possível selecionar a skin para cada um dos jogadores. É algo puramente visual, para diferenciar os jogadores.

A dificuldade é proporcional ao número de jogadores, aumentando o número de inimigos. Felizmente, os itens pegos são compartilhados entre todos jogadores.

A câmera é fixa, e não irá se afastar ou dividir. Caso um jogador avance mais do que os outros, a tela se centrará no jogador que avançou, e os jogadores restantes serão teletransportados para o canto esquerdo da tela.

Caso um dos jogadores morra, ele poderá apertar o botão de tiro para reviver, pegando emprestado parte da vida dos outros jogadores. Clássico, e útil pra ninguém ter que ficar assistindo!

Máfia italiana, zumbis e cannoli - essa mistura dificilmente poderia dar errado. Guns, Gore & Cannoli é ao mesmo tempo um jogo belíssimo, sangrento e divertido, ideal para os fãs de jogos em plataforma.

As animações são muito bem feitas, e o nível de detalhamento dos cenários realmente impressiona. É uma obra de arte, muito agradável de se ver.

Apesar da campanha curta, as 4 dificuldades são um incetivo à rejogabilidade. Sem contar que jogar cooperativamente, rende uma boa sessão de jogatina na medida certa.

Análise completa em http://www.poepra2.com.br/analise/guns-gore-cannoli/

18063058.review: Guns, Gore and Cannoli, is een Vlaams spel dat verrast door zijn kwaliteit.  In dit spel is het de bedoeling dat je als Vinnie Cannoli je weg vecht door de verschillende stadsdelen van Thugtown, een fictieve stad waar zombies de macht hebben overgenomen. Hoewel de verhaallijn eerder matig is en hoofdzakelijk doelt op het aaneen rijgen van de verschillende hoofdstukken, zit het spel vernuftig ineen. De feilloze besturing, de overvloed aan wapens, de op de Belgische strips geïnspireerde achtergronden,...; allen werken ze mee aan het creëren van een knotsgekke sfeer waarin je als Vinnie Cannoli je weg baant door de stad. Daarenboven zorgen de verschillende soorten vijanden (dwergen die aan ballonen vasthangen, gemuteerde ratten, zombie rugby spelers,  vampieren, bandieten,...) steeds voor een uitdaging, aangezien ze elk hun eigen sterktes en zwaktes hebben. Vooral wanneer de verschillende soorten tezamen op je toestormen is het een hele klus om de gepaste manoeuvres te combineren met het meest geschikte wapen. Je vervelen is dus onmogelijk. Een additioneel pluspunt is het feit dat het spel beschikt over een Nederlandstalige ondertiteling, iets dat je deze dagen praktisch enkel terugvindt bij de titels van de grote ontwikkelaars. Hierdoor is het spel ook geschikt voor de iets jongere en/of de Engels onmachtige medemens. De prijs van het spel is tenslotte zeer schappelijk, zelfs zonder korting krijg je waar voor je geld.

A very short but very fun ride. Get it if you enjoy Metal Slug and the like but only get it if it's on sale, I don't recommended it at the current price cause, besides being too short, it doesn't have online multiplayer which is a must for these types of games in this day and age.

On hard mode it proves challenging in many areas, especially cause of the AI which I really liked, I'm specially talking about the living ones, they sure do have more 'tricks' than moving forward and shooting and even then, there's also variety for the dead ones. I enjoyed the writing and the voice acting, the story is cliché and filled with Italian stereotypes which isn't surprising given the title but surprisingly it does have zombified, drunk leprechauns so for that reason alone you should get this game! A first in any genre, game of the millennium material right there.

17677142.review:
Alright, this was a fun game that definitely shows its fondness for the Metal Slug series. 

As far as this game itself, it was over the top silly, with super exaggerated voice acting that was at times hilarious. The story was actually pretty cool such as it is, and was a pretty unique take on how a zombie outbreak might begin. You play as a hitman/enforcer, Vinnie Cannoli, sent by your boss to pick up a dude named Frankie who is held by a rival gangster family. Shit just gets out of hand from there, lol. 

The graphics were really cool looking. Very cartoon and gangster Noire all at once, with vivid colors and striking landscapes, minimalist as they were. 

The enemy variety is fairly limited, but the game isnt long enough for that to really matter. You basically have a couple different types of a few different enemies (zombies, zombie rats, gangsters, and military). 

The gameplay was pretty fast and furious, with an assortment of cool weapons that you find along the way and can scroll between on the fly. Ammo isn't generally scarce although you will have some barely eked by with not much ammo left moments. Also, health packs are in the form of cannoli, lol, which Vinnie seems to love and comments on pretty much every time. This alternates between funny and annoying depending on how many times you here it in a short span of time (such as if there is a cannoli at the start of a boss battle which you keep dying in). Speaking of boss battles, there are pretty much three of them, although the last has several parts to it.

What else? Lots of jumping around and blowing stuff up. Some platforming mixed in.

Oh, and the script was strictly followed by the voice actors. They embellished a lot, as is evidenced by the fact that the subtitles wont necessarily match what is being said. It works though. You can tell they had a lot of fun with it, and that is a theme that carries through all the aspects of this game. Just the right length to keep you interested and allow you to appreciate the labor of love which was created here.

Holy Cannoli! I give this 9 drunken, St Patties day gangsters getting in your bullets way and being eaten by zombies out of 10 possible.

17635193.review:
L'exemple parfait du "petit jeu sympathique et pas prise de tête", Guns, Gore & Canolli trouve un angle original pour placer ses zombies : la prohibition et la mafia, agrémenté d'un style graphique dessiné du plus bel effet.
Pour le reste c'est du classique, on avance et on fait exploser des zombies (assez variés) à coup de tommy gun, fusil à pompe, lance-roquette...

Simple...et presque trop en fait, les niveaux sont linéaires (il n'y pas de passages secrets), les skins sont...des skins et non pas des personnages avec des capacités propres qui auraient pu varier le gameplay.
Défaut mineur il est vrai par rapport au gros point noir du jeu : les combats de boss, qui font sans doute parties des plus horribles jamais vu.
En effet, ceux-ci sont extrêmement mobiles, vous obligeant à suivre leur déplacement constamment...sauf que votre personnage est lent ! De même que ses animations de rechargement prennent parfois du temps, il n'est pas rare de se retrouver complètement submergé et mourir très rapidement (à titre personnel, j'ai battu un boss grâce à un bug qui l'a immobiliser dans un coin...).

Dommage car le jeu bénéficie d'une durée suffisamment courte pour éviter la lassitude. Si jamais vous avez une après-midi à tuer et que le jeu est en promo...

17587608.review:
[h1]This game was reviewed using a code sent by the developer.[/h1]

Guns, Gore & Cannoli is a a side scrolling action shooter with the welcome addition of zombies. This game was released in April 2015 and has actually got a surprisingly low number of owners given how awesome it is. You play the role of a gangster named Vinnie. You are thrown into Thugtown to find another gangster who has gone missing. You soon find the town has been overrun by zombies as you wade your way through streets, buildings, sewers and urban America.

This is one of the best side scroller games of this type; it's action packed and face paced. Gunplay is a key factor, with about 8 or 9 different weapons which you will eventually find, you have plenty in your arsenal. Whilst working your way through the levels, you will find health packs in the form of Cannoli and tons of ammo to keep you rolling. All of the weapons have their own feel and different uses and none of them feel useless.  There are a couple of jumping type puzzles in the latter levels, but the platforming element of the game is very limited. 

The art style in Guns, Gore & Cannoli is gorgeous. The cartoon magazine style look really works well with the setting and story. Not to mention all of the animations are perfectly done too. I often find problems with games that have a generic cartoon look, but this is easily one of the best games to pull it off. 

Guns, Gore & Cannoli also has some very nicely recorded voice acting; the American/Italian accent feels like it has just come straight off the streets of New York. Hats off to these devs who put in the extra work for the voice acting, as they could of quite easily just put in text instead, for me it made the game so much more enjoyable. 

This game has a very gentle difficulty curve, I only really struggled with the last couple of levels of the game, but was able to push on through once the best weapon was chosen for the scenario. The end boss is also quite challenging too which is a refreshing change compared to other games nowadays.  At some points trying to kill everything on site is not always the best option too; sometimes you just need to run and hope that there is a checkpoint near by because you are just being overrun - keep that in mind. 

Length wise, I completed the game in just under three hours on single player. Whilst there is no real need to replay it again, there are also plenty of achievements for you to go back and hunt, and this can be done easily though the Chapter select option. Guns, Gore & Cannoli also has a local co-op feature too, I have yet to try it out but have watched a couple of Youtube videos of it; and it looks so much fun. This is going to be one of those games that I sit down and play with my partner and finish it for a second time. 

I had one technical issue whilst playing; sometimes the game would freeze for half a second. This seems to happen especially when reaching save points; but also happens at random points too. This is a known problem with the game and has been reported to the devs. It seems to point to an issue with the fact that the game records lots of stats, such as headshots etc. 

In conclusion; Guns, Gore & Cannoli is a really nicely put together game, and one that needs to be experienced by more people than it already has. For the none sale price of £6,99, this is a bargain to pick up especially if you have friends to play with. 

[b][u] Tom's Score Card[/u][/b]
1) Stay away
2) Only recommended when on sale
3) Recommended
[b][u]4) Highly recommended[/u][/b]

"E allora? Chi sono io? Nessuno?? Posso occuparmi di un paio di cadaveri lungo la strada e i tirapiedi me li mangio a colazione...Capisc?!"
Sto gioco è l'unione di 3 cose che mi piacciono:Zombi,mafia e armi ma partiamo con ordine...

-Il personaggio è epico,cazzuto e fa molte citazioni a film a tema mafioso

Il gioco è ambientato negli anni 20,nel puro proibizionismo e voi sarete Vinnie Cannoli un sicario della mala che viene chiamato per i lavori più pericolosi;Verrete contattati dal Don Belluccio(Che assomiglia incredibilmente al Padrino Vito Corleone) che vi chiederà di andare a Thugtown,una città in preda ad un invasione di zombi creati dall'alcool,a cercare Frankie la Mosca,uno dei suoi uomini più importanti.
Il gioco è un avventura,platform 2D,sparatutto dove sullo schermo avrete:
-Vinnie(il vostro personaggio)

-L'ambiente

é un gioco semplice ma allo stesso tempo carino e divertente,sopratutto se vi piace riempire di piombo la gente con una Tommy Gun

Voto 9/10

17324560.review:
Guns, Gore & Cannoli - это двухмерный зомби - шутер разработанный бельгийской студией Crazy Monkey Studios. Здесь вы погрузитесь во атмосферу Американского сухого закона и почувствуете себя самым настоящим гангстером.

История игры предлагает нам познакомиться с неким Винни Канноли, который работает на мафию, и выполняет различные тяжелые задания. События игры разворачиваются в 1920 году во время введения Сухого закона в Америке. И вот в очередной раз нас отправляют на задание, нашему герою предстоит найти в городе Тагтаун человека по имени Фрэнки. Однако по прибытию в город, Винни понимает, что ему будет не так просто выполнить свой контракт. Убить нас захотят не только местные мафиози, а еще конечно же толпы мертвецов.

Геймплей очень динамичный, вы должны быстро реагировать на то какие враги вас атакуют и использовать их слабости. Если вы отвлечетесь хоть на секунду то сразу же пойдете на съедение зомби. В каждой ситуации придется использовать различное оружие чтобы добиться успеха. Арсенал главного героя достаточно примитивный для 20-ых годов, основные типы стрелкового оружия (9-ти миллиметровый пистолет, автомат «Томпсон», пара видов дробовиков, огнемет и т.д.). Также имеются гранаты, коктейли Молотова, которые немного разнообразят игровой процесс.

Что касается противников то тут присутствует множество различных видов зомби, от обычных мертвецов до летающей нечисти. Каждый из мертвецов по своему уникален (например один передвигается очень быстро, второй хорошо прыгает, третий ползает, но если ударит это будет ощутимо, четвертый может использовать пистолет). Помимо зараженных, герой встретит гангстеров и солдат. Гангстеры отличаются цветом костюма, и оружием которые они используют.

Графика очень приятная, напоминает такой проект как (Castle Crashers). Игры с рисованной графикой пользуются большой популярность у игроков, и Guns, Gore & Cannoli не исключение. Анимация персонажей и различные визуальные эффекты выглядят прекрасно. Также хотелось поблагодарить дизайнеров, они смогли воссоздать атмосферу 20-ых готов на картинке.

Конечно хотелось бы, чтобы разработчики сделали DLC в котором сюжет был бы, именно на исторические события сухого закона.

В итоге бельгийцы подарили нам блестящий проект который стоит всего лишь 250 рублей. Здесь есть все, прекрасная графика, изумительный игровой процесс и сюжет который довольно короткий (проходиться за 3-4 часа).Поклонникам игр с двухмерной графикой обязательно стоит обратить внимание на данный продукт.

Плюсы
Рисованная графика
Атмосфера 20-ых годов
Захватывающий игровой процесс
Можно играть с друзьями
Музыкальное сопровождение
Местами становиться сложнее 
Множество различных врагов
Достижения 
Стоимость всего 250

Минусы
Короткий сюжет
Арсенал оружия маловат
Через пару часов начинает чувствоваться однообразность

8/10

*Для ознакомления с игрой, ключ предоставил разработчик.

17058668.review:
这种2d横版射击游戏很少见啊,先赞一个.质量很高,但是难度太高了.
作为射击游戏弹药太有限,虽然补给多,但除了初始的手枪无限子弹外,其他枪的子弹上限都少得可怜,而且重要的是感觉武器伤害不平衡,汤姆森的伤害弱的可怜,散弹的范围太小,喷火器要很多下才能烧着,很难像预览图那样爽快的射射射.即使最简单的难度下,子弹上限的问题,基本其他枪一下就没子弹了.

吐槽过弹药上限后就是敌人了,敌人分为4种,丧尸,黑手党,军队,BOSS.然后丧尸细分,又分了几种,最恶心的就是那种橄榄球运动员丧尸,其次就是那些穿着燕尾服却跟疯子一样冲上来抓的,关卡设计里很多恶意的地方,比如有关是打黑手党,一条路隔一段遇到敌人想回头躲一下,就看到背后刷橄榄球了,一被撞到直接秒(最高难度),简直恶意,全程基本也都是,一旦你前面遇到一大波敌人,不管是什么种类的,背后肯定也刷了一大堆.不说了,这种还是自己体验比较好,虽然也不到砸键盘的程度,但没有预想的那种爽快感.

游戏素质很高虽然是2D但动作流畅,关卡设计的很恶意,武器种类多挺好玩但子弹上限少一下就没了,虽然前面没说但每个存档点都能回满血还是挺亲切的,总结还是推荐这游戏,虽然不能跟宣传视频一样爽快的射射射,不能当做发泄游戏来玩,但用来打发时间挺不错

16848881.review:
My cousins and I are the true connoisseurs of the side-scrolling beat 'em up. Amongst are favourites are not just the obvious Battletoads, Metal Slug, and Final Fight, Streets of Rage, TMNT, and X-men Arcade, but obscure classics like Spiderman: Maximum Carnage and The Punisher (to say nothing of Comix Zone and other single-player excellence). To say that we like our side-scrollers co-opy and button-mashy is an understatement.

We're also Italian and love Sopranos.

So Guns, Gore, Cannoli to us is pretty much the dream game, and aside from some rough edges — particularly level transitions and its weird spawning system — GGC proved to be a welcome return to form for a genre that has been largely neglected.

The corny story is actually very well executed, with nicely-voiced and drawn cinematics that break up the otherwise excellent gunplay and average platforming. The animation of the action, in particularly, is worthy of note; the flamethrower and electricity gun produce some very satisfying results. It all feels, plays, and looks very Metal Slug-ish.

Piece by piece, you can easily tear apart the game's mechanics — nothing is really best-in-class here — but the parts are very much greater than the whole.

Given that, it's not hard to recommend GGC if you're at all a fan of the side scroller and have a bunch of bros or broads to help you fight the good fight.

16806639.review:
[h1]優しめのメタルスラッグ。[/h1]

しかし、戦車は出てきません。出てくるのはゾンビとギャングと武装集団です。
また一撃死ではなく、体力制です。

《良い点》

　○武器の切り替えが可能
　　　一度取得した武器は弾さえ手に入れれば何度でも使用可能。
　　　また、ライト、ヘビーマシンガン、電気銃などバリエーションも
　　　豊富です。しかし、一度に装填できる弾数は決まっているので
　　　リロードが必要になります。また特殊武器としてグレネードと
　　　火炎瓶があります。


　○敵の敵は敵
　　　先ほど述べたようにゾンビ、ギャング、武装集団が敵として出
　　　てきますが、ギャングや武装集団にとってもゾンビは敵なので、　
　　　プレイヤーより近いゾンビを攻撃します。ゾンビもまた同様で自
　　　分に近い敵を攻撃します。プレイヤーだけ攻撃してくるわけでは
　　　ないのでそこを上手く利用して敵の戦力を削りましょう。
　

　○何度でもコンティニューが可能
　　　何度死んでもチェックポイントから続けることが出来るため、ゲー
　　　ムオーバーになることはありません。正直インポッシブルモードは
　　　これがないと厳しいです。


《悪い点》　
　
　○マルチモードが無い
　　　これを投稿した現在、マルチモードはありません。せっかく最大4
　　　人まで協力プレイできるのにもったいないです。これから来るかも
　　　しれませんが。

　
　○ロードが長い
　　　ステージが切り替わる時に、読み込みに必要なロード時間が長い
　　　です。パソコンの性能によって違うかもしれませんが、今のところ
　　　不明です。


　○ボスの数が少ない
　　　メタルスラッグみたく１ステージに１ボスというわけではないです。
　　　ストーリー性があるせいか、ボスと呼べる敵が少ないです。


※難易度について
　　　イージー、ノーマル、ハード、インポッシブルとありますが、主に
　　　変わるのは敵の攻撃力です。難しくなるごとに一撃食らうごとの
　　　ダメージ量が大きくなります。ちなみにインポッシブルはそれに加
　　　えて敵の数が多くなります。下手に進むと、すぐにリンチ状態に
　　　なります。


《感想》

全体としては非常に出来のいいゲームであり、私は良作と感じました。トレカもあり、実績もメタルスラッグに比べれば、そう難しくないと思います。一応家庭用でも夏に発売予定なので、もしかしたらその時に日本語化されるかもしれないので、それまで待ってみてもいいかもしれません。横スクロールアクションやメタルスラッグみたいなゲームが好きな人にはオススメします。

16710575.review:
[h1] Overveiw:	[/h1]
Gun's Gore & Cannoli is a comical, 2D, action, shoot em' up, platformer where you run-and-gun through several different enemy types, all beautifully hand drawn. I have fully beaten the main campaign on the normal difficulty and though I did die quite a bit, It never put me at the point of quitting out of frustration. 

[h1] Gameplay:	[/h1]
Although the game is 2D, the environment is quite explorable. I never had any issues with the height  of what I was shooting like many other platforming games do. There is limb damage meaning if you shoot them in the head, it'll be faster kill than shooting them in the foot. You start out with a basic pea shooter but vastly grow your arsenal of killing tools as the game progresses, adding a fresh touch to every level.

[h1] Good Things:	[/h1]
- Amazing art style and animation
- Progressive balanced difficulty
- Controls feel good on both keyboard and controller (Which is fully compatible)
- You gain new weapons as you progress through the the game
- Local play on same system, 2 keyboards, 1 controller
- Several different enemy types and Boss levels
- Creative and clever story line. "Wow that ending..." - Jahn

[h1] Just Things:	[/h1]
- Runs fairly easy (Non-high tier PC capability)  
- Settings for audio, control mapping, resolution etc.
- Translating subtitles
- Throughout the whole game enemy's attack you from both sides (left and right) which in the early stages I found a nuisance but learned to adapt after I found the [spoiler]Tommy[/spoiler] gun 
- Humor that forces a grin but nothing that knocks you out of your chair with laughter

[h1] Not So Good Things:	[/h1]
- No online multiplayer
- Not too much replay value (I only played one playthrough, and it was very satisfying) 
- Pretty short
- There is no way to jump down from a platform

[h1] Conclusion	[/h1]
Overall I would say this game is a good buy. 8.3/10 would cannoli again.

16661342.review:
Guns, Gore & Cannoli Is an absolutely great platform shooter gem. The game and its story is basically that you play as the mafia enforcer Vinnie Cannoli in the prohibtion time who is up against both rival gangs and hordes of different zombies aswell. The different enemies you are up against has different weapons and skills like some are fast runners and others are slow, some can be killed with one shot and others are more resistant and demands either more shots or with more heavy weaponry. 
The gameplay is pretty much to get from point A to point B while blowing enemies and a few bosses  to kingdom come. In the gameplay sense this game isnt very  original but where the game really exceeds itself towards other platformers is in the graphics,soundtrack and comedic departments. The graphics is like taken out from a cartoon and eventhough some usable platforms sometimes blends into the surroundings it all works very well together as a live cartoon. The soundtrack is also very fitting to the game with its jazzy toons that is like taken from the time period of the prohibition. The comedy of this game is really funny as it is as stereotypical as it comes in regard of italian american mafia flicks and mr cannoli often comes with a kliche' one liners about the guy/zombie whom he just blew to smotherines. 
 This game had my attention from the first time i saw it but i wasnt sure it would live up to my expectations so i just bought it in the summer sale eventhough it wasnt really much reduced in prize and im really happy that i did that as this is a really great fun. Ive played platformers since sega master card system and on the amiga aswell so i have played my share of these types of games and this one is really great even at full prize. The only thing i can complaint a little about is the length of the game but still in my opinion its an acceptable one. 
 Ill rate this game 8.5 out of 10 and its very recommendable for all platform and cartoon and gangster fans with a love for over the top comedic violence and funny one liners. Yes thats some good cannoli !!!
